        Withdraws the amount in parameter from the account.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the transaction succeeded, false otherwise.

      • canWithdraw

        public boolean canWithdraw(int amount)
        Checks if the amount in parameter can be withdrawn from the account.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        true if the transaction can be performed, false otherwise.
